description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Accordion widget in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

product.name: Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders
Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders
